name: Question the news of the day and send ideas via Telegram
description:
Retrieves the news from a news feed, identifies a gap using InfraNodus, then generates a question that bridges this gap and helps you generate new ideas in relation to the main trends.

This template was created by a 3rd party and has not been tested by Make. For support and other questions, please reach out to info@noduslabs.com or https://support.noduslabs.com
